0.0.2.en:
### KeyMagic 0.0.2

#### New Features
- Support for multiple KM2 file format versions (1.3, 1.4, and 1.5)
- Keyboard icon support - display custom icons for your keyboards
- Import wizard for easy keyboard setup on first run
- Automatic color assignment for keyboards without custom icons
- Better keyboard file management in app data directory

#### Improvements
- Enhanced active keyboard visibility with outline and badge
- Simplified build process and utilities
- Centralized version management
- Better handling of missing keyboard files

#### Bug Fixes
- Fixed keyboard replacement during updates
- Improved installer to properly update existing keyboards
- Skip import wizard when no keyboards need importing
